greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonleading zeros in primorial base expansion of A276086(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32768
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
formula: For all n >= 1, a(A143293(n-1)) = n. [Note however that these are not the first occurrences of each n, that is, A143293 does not give the indices of records]
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2019
